resources.string: To extend battery life, Adaptive Battery limits battery usage for infrequently used apps. Your phone will learn how you use apps over time. \n\nNotifications may be delayed for these apps.
To extend battery life, Adaptive Battery limits battery usage for infrequently used apps. Your tablet will learn how you use apps over time. \n\nNotifications may be delayed for these apps.
